characterList: 孫卻腳服命留溜聊柳令冷零領通勇犯危脆印

characters.story: "Sun!" The child on the family line sang cheerfully - a grandson continuing the thread!
"Chueh!" Divination commanded withdrawal sharply - retreat, yet stand firm!
The foot takes the shape of foot, whispering "Jiao" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Foo, what clothing should I wear?" The moon and hand questioned apparel curiously.
Fate's mouth opens, commanding "Ming!" sharply - life's destiny spoken!
"Lyo, should I remain here?" The field questioned whether to stay, detained.
"Lyo!" On the water they sang cheerfully, sliding away, skating and slipping!
"Liao, want to talk more?" The ear questioned how to chat curiously, passing time!
Like a tree, this character means willow and whispers "Lyo"!
"Ling!" The seal stamped orders sharply - the decree was issued!
A striking symbol for cold that whispers "Leng" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The rain stands for zero, asking "Ling? Nothing left?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show collar, whispering "Ling" softly - a vivid image to remember!
See how the stick forms to communicate? It sings "Tong!" cheerfully!
This character represents courageous, whispering "Yong" softly!
A criminal dog half-committed commands "Fan!" sharply violating rules!
Danger! Rock climbing bound by fingerprints sings "Way!" anxiously high on the cliff!
"Tsway!" Flesh in danger commanded sharply - fragile, brittle, and easily broken!
"Yin!" The hand pressed the seal sharply to print - a stamp marking India's mark!
